sentences.sContent: Upon receipt of the notice of assignment of the obligee's right, the obligor may, in respect of the assignee, avail itself of any defense it has against the assignor.
sentences.sContent_eng: Upon receipt of the notice of assignment of the obligee's right, the obligor may, in respect of the assignee, avail itself of any defense it has against the assignor.
sentences.sCn: 第八十三条债务人接到债权转让通知时，债务人对让与人享有债权，并且债务人的债权先于转让的债权到期或者同时到期的，债务人可以向受让人主张抵销。

sentences.sContent: Article39 Where a registered trademark is assigned, the assignor and assignee shall conclude a contract for the assignment, and jointly file an application with the trademark Office.
sentences.sContent_eng: Article39 Where a registered trademark is assigned, the assignor and assignee shall conclude a contract for the assignment, and jointly file an application with the trademark Office.
sentences.sCn: 第三十九条转让注册商标的，转让人和受让人应当签订转让协议，并共同向商标局提出申请。

synos.tran: 代理人；[法][经]受托人；分配到任务的人

remMethod.val: 来自assign (v. 分配； 指派) + ee (人) → 受托人

words.tran: [经] 可分配的；可指定的；可让渡的
分配；约会；指定；[经] 转让

trans.tranOther: a person to whom some right, interest, or property is transferred
